page.title: 04 TOURISM IN CROOK,CUMBRIA
page.content: CROOK LIES ON A BUSY ROAD IN THE LAKE DISTRICT AND VISITORS USE THE AREA FOR CAMPING,WALKING AND OVERNIGHT STOPS DURING THE HOLIDAY SEASON.THERE ARE TWO CAMP SITES,ONE SET IN 22 ACRES OF UNDULATING COUNTRYSIDE WITH 300 CARAVANS AND NUMEROUS TENTS. FACILITIES INCLUDE A LAUNDERETTE ,SHOP,CAFE AND BAR, AND PLAYAREA-THERE ARE FEW FOREIGN VISITORS. THE SUN INN RELIES ON PASSING TRADE AND ONE NIGHT STOPS ALL THE YEAR ROPUND.SOME OF THE FAARMS AND PRIVATE DWELLINGS CATER FOR THE BED AND BREAKFAST TRADE TAKING A SMALL NUMBER OF VISITORS EACH. ONE ENTERPRISING LADY HAS A WEAVING STUDIO ALONGSIDE HER GUESTHOUSE. A SECTION OF THE DALES WAY,AN 81 MILE LONG FOOTPATH IS WELL USED BY WALKERS. ABOUT 20 COTTAGES ARE USED SOLELY BY VISITORS DURING THE HOLIDAY SEASON.
